message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponses' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController'.
